title: Juanita Castro, anti-communist sister of Cuban leaders Fidel and Raul, dies at 90
description: Juanita Castro has died in Miami at age 90. Florida had been her home since shortly after fleeing the island nearly 60 years ago.

title: White House proposes to 'march in' on patents for costly drugs
description: To lower drug prices, the Biden administration is looking to assert its authority to license drug patents that rely on government-funded research to drugmakers that would offer cheaper medicines.
